plot: The story of an old fashioned rocking horse who tries to regain the affection of a boy whose attention has turned to video games.
title: Off His Rockers
plot_es: The story of an old fashioned rocking horse who tries to regain the affection of a boy whose attention has turned to video games.
plot_en: The story of an old fashioned rocking horse who tries to regain the affection of a boy whose attention has turned to video games.
